Reviews.Title: “Nice little hotel, perfect location”
Reviews.Author: ok-59
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel ingles wife couple 4 nights october 2011 location perfect vacation barcelona hotel cozy staff helpful spoke english didnt serve breakfast lots cafes choose neighborhood noice street loud crowd bars trucks etc street sleeper wear earplugs fine anyhow liked hotel ingles

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant budget hotel in ideal location with friendly/helpful staff!”

Reviews.Content: husband stayed 7 nights hotel 30 walk liceu metro station las ramblas busy werent bothered street noise church tower bell chimes quarter hour bad perfect budget hotel bed comfy wardrobe bedside cabinets fan safe pay extra shower powerful hot provided shampoo sachets soap cleaned everyday staff reception friendly willing help questions staff recommended tapas bar beaten track tastiest food free glass cava hotel recommended definitely recommend ideal stay youre sight seeing barcelona budget
